column1: #Text=Roku says : " I was stuck in the Avatar State .
#Text=" Kaja says : " Looks like we have a lot more training to do ... after you rebuild the temple .
#Text=" Roku says : " I see my own impatience in you , Aang .
#Text=Do not be too hard on yourself .
#Text=You will master the Avatar State , as I finally did .
#Text=Look for Avatar Kyoshi in the place where Hei Bai sleeps !
#Text=Roku told me I 'd find you here !
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm happy to see you too .
#Text=I do n't suppose you 've seen Avatar Kyoshi around , have you ?
